summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department authorizing the execution of a Shared Cost Agreement with the City of Redmond for the rights-of-way acquisition, design, construction, operation, and maintenance, and the sharing of costs for the proposed water supply pipeline along Redmond-Kirkland Road between 140th Avenue N.E. and 170th Avenue N.E.; and increasing and expenditure allowance in The 1987 Budget of the Department by appropriation from the Water Fund.
